prompt: Find 3 potential venues for a team offsite in San Francisco. Check my calendar for availability on next Friday. Email the team ('team@example.com') with the venue options and confirm the date is free. Report the message ID.
gold_response: Found 3 venues: The Pearl, Terra Gallery, and Stable Cafe. Next Friday is free. Emailed the team (ID: e017).

rubric.criteria: The agent must search for venues in San Francisco and identify at least 3 options.
The agent must check the calendar for availability on next Friday.
The agent must send an email to 'team@example.com' with the venue options and a confirmation that the date is free.
The agent must report the message ID of the sent email.
